Instruction: Heat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a tube pan with butter and lightly dust it with flour.
Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.

Cream together the sugar and butter in a large bowl until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the milk and vanilla extract. Fold in the flour mixture until just combined. Pour the batter into the greased and floured tube pan.

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a tube pan. Mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. In a large bowl, beat sugar and butter until creamy. Add eggs one at a time, then mix in flour mixture and milk alternately. Pour batter into prepared tube pan. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean, about 1 to 1.5 hours. Cool in the pan, then invert onto a wire rack to cool completely.
